item.title: Latest update was Jan 1 for all builds.
Included the dwthings repo. Replaced 9Lives with THX1138 as main scraper. Updated MP3 Streams. YouTube addon now works.
SBPLAY2, EMBEDSITO source links have been working very well.
Added tons of options for changing colors. Skin Settings/Customization/Choose skin colors. The experimental build can also change skin images.
You can exit the Pluto guide by hitting back or backspace twice. The channels do take a few seconds to load when booting Kodi.
